ForienQuestLog.IsPersonalQuestDescriptio: Check to mark quest as Personal. It will be invisible to all players except those specifically marked below. Unchecking this option will remove all permissions and move quest to Hidden tab.
ForienQuestLog.Notifications.QuestMoved: Moved quest to new folder and gave it new status: {target}
ForienQuestLog.showFolder.EnableHint: Check to show quest data Folder in Journal tab. For DEBUG purposes only.
ForienQuestLog.availableQuests.EnableHin: Check to show new, "Available" tab in Quest Log, where players can see all non-hidden Quests before they are accepted.
ForienQuestLog.allowPlayersDrag.EnableHi: Check to allow Players drag Rewards from Quest's Details window to their Owned Actors.
ForienQuestLog.showTasks.EnableHint: Decide if or how to show amount of Tasks (objectives) next to Quest's title in Quest Log. This has no effect on Quest individual preview.
ForienQuestLog.navStyle.EnableHint: Decide how Quest Log's navigation should be displayed.
ForienQuestLog.titleAlign.EnableHint: Decide how to position quests' titles in Quest Log's table.
ForienQuestLog.QuestForm.Title: Add new Quest
ForienQuestLog.QuestLog.Title: Quest Log
ForienQuestLog.QuestPreview.Title: Quest Details
ForienQuestLog.QuestForm.DragDropActor: Drag & Drop Actor here to set it as Quest Giver
ForienQuestLog.SampleTask: f.e. Kill all rats in „The Twisted Ankle” inn
ForienQuestLog.DragDropRewards: Drag & drop items here to add them as rewards
ForienQuestLog.QuestPreview.InvalidQuest: Cannot open Quest's Preview due to invalid Quest ID.
ForienQuestLog.DeleteDialog.Title: Delete {name}
ForienQuestLog.DeleteDialog.Body: This quest and its data will be permanently deleted.
ForienQuestLog.Tooltips.TaskHidden: Task is Hidden. Click to show.
ForienQuestLog.Tooltips.TaskVisible: Task is Visible. Click to hide.
ForienQuestLog.Tooltips.RewardHidden: Reward is Hidden. Click to show.
ForienQuestLog.Tooltips.RewardVisible: Reward is Visible. Click to hide.
ForienQuestLog.PersonalQuestButNoPlayers: This is personal quest, but nobody sees it
ForienQuestLog.Api.hooks.createOpenQuest: API Error: Can't create macro with invalid Quest ID
ForienQuestLog.Api.create.title: API Error: Title property is required to create new Quest
ForienQuestLog.Api.reward.create.type: API Error: Type property is required to create new Reward
ForienQuestLog.Api.reward.create.data: API Error: Data property with at least {name, img} is required to create new Reward
ForienQuestLog.Api.task.create.name: API Error: Name property is required to create new Task
ForienQuestLog.Api.open: Cannot open Quest Details. You may lack permissions, Quest might not exist anymore, or provided ID was invalid.
